title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Shrug Off Central Bank’s Interest Rate Cut
contentSnippet: Recent jobs data and other economic indicators have pointed to a slowing economy.

title: Fed Delivers Expected 25 Basis Point Rate Cut as Markets Await Powell’s Comments
contentSnippet: Headed lower on Wednesday ahead of the news, bitcoin remained so in the minutes following the news at $111,700, down 3% over the past 24 hours.

title: Telegram Launches Cocoon: A Decentralized AI Network That Pays GPU Owners in Crypto
contentSnippet: Telegram founder Pavel Durov unveiled Cocoon—a TON-powered network where GPU owners earn crypto for providing private AI compute.

title: Kraken Top Crypto Exchange in EU Lobbying Spending Ahead of Coinbase
contentSnippet: Many crypto firms increased year-over-year spending 25% in 2024.

title: Senators Introduce Bill to Ban AI Companions for Minors Over Mental Health Fears
contentSnippet: The bipartisan GUARD Act would criminalize exploitative AI interactions with children and require companies to disclose when users are speaking to a machine.

title: Stellar Edges 1.5% Higher Breaking $0.32 Amid Institutional Accumulation
contentSnippet: XLM demonstrates resilience with modest gains and exceptional volume surge, signaling potential momentum building beneath current consolidation patterns.

title: Analysts Expect Strong Q3 for Coinbase But Disagree Sharply on Its Future
contentSnippet: Barclays, JP Morgan and Compass Point see gains in USDC and trading, but clash over Base, Deribit and profit margins.

title: Investment Bank Mizuho Says Visa Is Becoming the ‘Stablecoin of Stablecoins’
contentSnippet: Visa’s growing stablecoin network positions it as the key infrastructure player in blockchain payments, while individual tokens risk becoming commoditized assets.

title: HBAR Consolidates at $0.2010 as Volume Surge Signals Distribution
contentSnippet: Hedera faces selling pressure at $0.2055 resistance as trading volume explodes 137% above average, marking institutional distribution amid choppy price action.

title: Securitize Rolls Out Tokenized Credit Fund with BNY on Ethereum
contentSnippet: The fund offers exposure to collateralized loan obligations, with onchain capital allocator Grove planning a $100 million anchor investment.

title: Bitcoin ATMs Used for 'Missed Jury Duty' Scam, Massachusetts Police Warn
contentSnippet: At least two Massachusetts individuals fell victim to a Bitcoin ATM scam that lured them to transfer funds claiming they missed jury duty.

title: Crypto Long & Short: Fast Money, Slow Money
contentSnippet: Read this week’s Crypto Long & Short Newsletter for Andy Baehr's “Vibe Check,” a story of two markets. Then, learn how the true internet generation set the stage for digital currencies with Sam Ewen.

title: MegaETH Raises $450M in Oversubscribed Token Sale Backed by Ethereum Founders
contentSnippet: The high-speed Ethereum layer-2 drew nearly nine times its target as over 14,000 investors rushed in.

title: BNB Slips 2.7% As Traders Focus on Technicals During Crypto Market Drawdown
contentSnippet: The decline was part of a broader crypto market drop, with traders focusing on technical cues and selling dominating

title: Crypto Perps Are Easier to Access Than Ever Before—Is That A Good Thing?
contentSnippet: MetaMask, Phantom, and Telegram mini-app Blum now offer perpetual futures trading natively within their crypto apps. What are the risks?

title: Michael Saylor's Strategy Drops $18B in Value, but a Rebound May Be Near: 10X Research
contentSnippet: The company is expected to report another quarterly profit on Thursday, possibly reviving expectations for S&P 500 inclusion, 10x Research's Markus Thielen argued.

title: FED Decision Today! Monad 3 Day Airdrop! Western Union Stablecoin on SOL!
contentSnippet: BTC: 112.9k (-1%) | BTC.D: 60% (+0.3%). ETH: 4000 (-3%) | BNB: 1116 (-1%) | SOL: 194 (-4%). Top Gainers: PI, TRUMP, M, PAXG, ZEC. BTC ETFs: +$202m | ETH ETFs: +$246m. Crypto falls ahead of Fed decisio

title: BNB Meme Coin Tied to Statue of Changpeng Zhao Rises After CZ Says 'Don't Buy'
contentSnippet: A meme coin tied to a statue of Changpeng Zhao surged after the Binance founder encouraged people via social media to not buy the token.

title: Bitcoin Miner TeraWulf Aims to Raise $575 Million to Fund Google-Backed AI Ambitions
contentSnippet: The miner is pushing ahead quickly with its data center plans.

title: Morning Minute: Western Union Chooses Solana for Stablecoin
contentSnippet: Headlining a blockbuster day for Solana, which has a record-setting debut for its shiny new staking ETF as well.

title: 平将明議員、高市内閣で新たなポジションに就任　引き続き「Web3政策」の中核担う
contentSnippet: 石破前政権でデジタル大臣を務めた平将明氏が、自民党のサイバーセキュリティ本部長とWeb3小委員会委員長に就任。暗号資産税制改革のホワイトペーパーを取りまとめた実績を持つ平氏が、党内で政策立案の中枢を担う。

title: GrayscaleソラナETF上場控え　市場の熱気高まる
contentSnippet: グレースケールのソラナETF（GSOL）が29日にNYSE Arcaで取引開始。先行するビットワイズBSOLは初日5600万ドルの出来高を記録し、2025年上場の仮想通貨ETF中で最大に。米政府閉鎖下でも市場は活発な動き。

title: 株主優待に「仮想通貨XRP」導入、SBIインシュアランスG
contentSnippet: SBIインシュアランスグループが株主優待に仮想通貨XRPを導入。100株以上の保有で最大1.2万円相当を進呈。暗号資産優待の導入が国内でも広がりを見せている。

title: トム・リー率いるビットマイン、170億円相当のETHを新規購入か＝Lookonchain報告
contentSnippet: トム・リー氏率いるビットマインが約173億円相当のイーサリアムを新規購入かと報告。保有額は2兆円超え、世界最大のETH保有企業として総供給量の2.8%を保有。株式の流動性も米国46位にランクイン。

title: バイナンス、3銘柄を11月上場廃止予定
contentSnippet: 大手仮想通貨取引所バイナンスがフラミンゴ、カデナ、パーペチュアルプロトコルの現物取引ペアを11月12日に上場廃止すると発表した。定期審査の結果、業界基準を満たさないと判断された。

title: 【2026年度】仮想通貨（暗号資産）の最新税制要望から読み解く今後の法改正シナリオ｜Aerial Partners寄稿
contentSnippet: JVCEAと金融庁が2025年に提出した仮想通貨税制の最新要望を解説。ETF導入、申告分離課税、株式等同等扱いの3つの改正シナリオと、今後の制度変更に向けて準備すべきことを整理する。

title: RWAトークン化企業セキュリタイズ、SPAC上場決定　評価額は約1900億円
contentSnippet: RWAトークン化大手のSecuritizeが、Cantor Equity Partners IIとのSPAC合併により株式上場を発表。企業価値12.5億ドル、ブラックロックなど既存投資家が全株保有。市場シェア20%を占める最大手プラットフォーム。

title: 米ビットコインETF、ブラックロック除外では年初来マイナスフローに
contentSnippet: K33のアナリストが、米国の仮想通貨ビットコイン現物ETFの年初来流入がIBITに集中していると指摘。ブラックロックの役割の大きさが示されている。

title: リップルやSBI出資のエバーノース、10億ドル相当のXRPを保有＝オンチェーンデータ
contentSnippet: エバーノースが約3.89億XRPを購入し、投資額は9.47億ドルに達したことが分かった。既に5000万ドル以上の含み益を得ている。

title: 万博提供のデジタルウォレット、約100万ダウンロード達成
contentSnippet: 大阪・関西万博で提供された「EXPO2025デジタルウォレット」が約100万ダウンロードを達成。会期中に累計590万件の取引を処理した。10月31日より「HashPort Wallet」へリニューアルし、マルチチェーン対応やDEX機能を搭載する。
